title: Paris Jackson dresses up as Gandalf from Lord of the Rings while brother Prince adds a Santa hat
text:
They host an annual Thriller Night Costume party to benefit the Heal LA Foundation each year.

And Paris and Prince Jackson sure meant business when they walked the red carpet in their elaborate costumes on Friday night.

While the eldest child of the late Michael Jackson didn't appear to put in much effort time, the 21-year-old beauty and her boyfriend Gabriel Glenn went all out as Gandalf and Radagast from Lord of the Rings.

Scroll down for video

Went all out: Paris Jackson teamed up with her boyfriend, Gabriel Glenn, to wear Lord of the Rings inspired costumes on Friday night, while her brother Prince opted for just a Santa Claus hat

Paris took to social media to document her entire transformation into an 'old man.'

She enlisted celebrity stylist, Chloe Bartoli to help with the costume as well as many hair and makeup artists to bring the look alive.

The singer was dressed as the Lord of the Rings character, Gandalf while her boyfriend rocked a Radagast ensemble to match.

It took a village! She enlisted celebrity stylist, Chloe Bartoli to help with the costume as well as many hair and makeup artists to bring the look alive

Couples costume! The singer was dressed as the Lord of the Rings character, Gandalf while her boyfriend rocked a Radagast ensemble to match

Simple look: Prince decided to keep things very simple and easy, opting for an oversized statement sweater and tan colored trousers

Prince decided to keep things very simple and easy, opting for an oversized statement sweater and tan colored trousers.

He completed his Halloween look with a Santa hat on his head.

Paris took to social media to gush over her elder brother early on Saturday morning.

'i’m sooooo proud of you big brother @princejackson,' she began.

Everyone's here! Also at the event was family members Taryll Jackson, TJ Jackson, Prince and Taj Jackso

'i know i say it all the fuckin’ time but your way with words, the grace, eloquence, and composure is out of this world and always blows me away. you’ve got such a great head on your shoulders and are doing some really fucking amazing things.'

She continued: 'you’ve always been my idol and role model and even more so as each day goes on. i love you with all of my heart. happy halloween everyone!! xxo -radagast and gandalf.'

Prince shared a photo of the invite on social media on Friday and confirmed the event was taking place at the family's Hayvenhurst House residence in Encino, California.

A family affair: The Jackson family host the annual event at their Hayvenhurst, Encino, residents

Lots of effort: Paris took to social media to document her entire transformation into an 'old man'

The property was purchased by the Jackson brothers' father, Joe Jackson, in 1971 after his Jackson 5 kids' success.

The house is where Paris now calls home, moving out of the Calabasas home she shared with her grandmother and other family members when she turned 18.

Paris lived in the property's guesthouse while the main area was being remodeled.
description: Paris Jackson teamed up with her boyfriend, Gabriel Glenn, to wear Lord of the Rings inspired costumes on Friday night, while her  brother Prince opted for just a Santa Claus hat.
